thread.section_title: The Five Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Expensive and Poor Breakfast
thread.title_full: Expensive and Poor Breakfast - Review of The Five Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: James Shaw R
title: Expensive and Poor Breakfast
text:
Hotel was adequate for the price, but do not have the Breakfast. Walk out and find a local Cafe, cheaper and better service can be found locally.
Breakfast was very disappointing for the price of â‚¬15 each. And the service was terrible in making sure the food was kept stocked up. . The cooked breakfast dishes were empty, and no-one came to look or replenish them, jams were not available no choice, Tea selection was poor. Extremely dissatisfied with Breakfast for the price
